title: How to Navigate Amazon’s Big Spring Sale Like an ELLE Editor
description: Some items are already massively discounted.
excerpt: ELLE editors share everything they’re buying from Amazon’s 2025 Big Spring Sale.

Noise-Canceling Earbuds

Apple Buy AirPods Pro 2

“I’ve had my original AirPods Pros since 2020, and five years later, they’ve finally died on me. Call me a sucker, but I’m an Apple loyalist through and through. I like how Airpods look, feel, and work with my other Apple products, okay? I’m taking the demise of my first pair as a sign that I should invest in the AirPods Pros 2 while they’re on sale. Nothing can beat the convenience of wireless earbuds, and I love toggling between the noise canceling and transparency modes depending on whether or not I want to let the world’s noise into my brain.”—Carol Lee, associate beauty commerce writer

higherdose Red Light Face Mask

A Viral Water Tumbler

Stanley The Quencher H2.0 Flowstate™ Tumbler

“I would be a dew-less shriveled raisin without my Stanley cup.”—Dale Chong, senior fashion commerce editor

A Cozy Pajama Set

Cozy Earth Long Sleeve Pajama Set

“I used to be a sweats and random T-shirt girl when it came to loungewear, but something about a matching set is so enticing. I’ve collected quite a few over the past year, and Cozy Earth’s bamboo pajamas are hands down the softest, most comfortable ones I own. They’re also so breathable that I can wear them no matter the season, and I feel so put together, even when I’m having the laziest Sunday ever. I wear mine so often that I’ve put them through the wringer (I’ve washed and dried them too many times to count), but somehow, they still look brand new.”—Carol Lee, associate beauty commerce writer

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Medicube Salmon DNA PDRN Pink Collagen Gel Mask

“I keep seeing this mask all over my TikTok timeline, thanks to its collagen-boosting effects. Right now is the best time to try it since it’s on sale.”—Alexis Bennett Parker, commerce content lead

A Comfy Pant

Stateside Ponte Barrel Pants

“I’m permanently on the search for wardrobe staples that feel like pajamas, and I think I might have just the jackpot with these jersey barrel pants.”—Meg Donohue, associate fashion commerce editor

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

A Powerful Water Flosser

Waterpik Ion Professional Water Flosser

“For many people, flossing is the dreaded, tedious part of their oral care routine they wish they could forgo. I’m here to tell you don’t—instead, invest in a water flosser and watch your life change for the better. While it shouldn’t replace manual flossing, this water flosser is my go-to and helps eliminate debris from those hard-to-reach areas or serves as a mid-day clean-up after a kale salad.”—Nerisha Penrose, beauty commerce editor
